name: Wrecked (itch) (JackOatley)
description:
A Card Game about personalities. Note that it is far from complete, time ended up being a bit hectic and a lot of things couldn't be implemented, balanced or finished. But managed to wrap it up for LOWREZJAM! And I hope the idea itself comes accross. :)

Tutorial:

The Overworld map contains points where you meet people you have to engage with, after winning each engagement you go to the next point until you reach the end.

During an engagement you play cards against your opponent. There are 2 types of cards: Elements and Aspects. Aspects have ATK and DEF skills as well as a preferred Element (shown as the background of the card), which adds +1 to the skill being used (if you're attacking you get +1 to ATK, if you're defending you get +1 to DEF). The goal if to outmatch the opponent's card's DEF with your card's ATK. And when able attack the opponent directly to reduce his hitpoints to 0. You play cards by clicking them and placing them onto the board. To attack you simply click a placed Aspect.

When you win an engagement you will also be rewarded new cards that will help you later. You can manage your Deck from the Overworld via the Deck Manager. Simply select the 2 cards you want to swap then click the swap button.
